relationships.description: Hermione sat down at the Gryffindor table, but with her back to Harry.
Harry visited Madam Puddifoot’s Tea Shop where something happened with Cho.
Hermione glanced over at the Ravenclaw table.
Harry dated Cho, but something went wrong with their date.
